bibl.title: Adoulis, the Gateway of the Hellenic Influences to the Ethiopian Highlands.
bibl.note: Examines the role of Adoulis, the port of Axum, in the development of the Afro-Hellenic civilisation of this state and its importance as a gate between Greek and Ethiopian cultures. Attention is given to the origin, development, zenith and final decline of the port, its significance for Axum, and the Greek presence in it.
bibl.seg: Effie Zacharopoulou, Adoulis, the Gateway of the Hellenic Influences to the Ethiopian Highlands.

Examines the role of Adoulis, the port of Axum, in the development of the Afro-Hellenic civilisation of this state and its importance as a gate between Greek and Ethiopian cultures. Attention is given to the origin, development, zenith and final decline of the port, its significance for Axum, and the Greek presence in it.
